nodes.text: This pin-up of a Twi'lek was a decorative poster available in the galaxy during the Clone Wars. It showed a scantily clad Twi'lek female in a seductive pose.

This image was painted by Justin Ridge, and was developed for The Clone Wars episode Rookies. In the episode, it can be seen gracing the walls in Rishi Station. The poster can also be seen in Hondo Ohnaka's pirate outpost in The Gungan General and Lethal Trackdown, in the Christophsis Republic base in The Hidden Enemy, in Cliffhold in Mystery of a Thousand Moons, and the Moshi Bar in Lethal Trackdown.
